job_title: Challenge Events Manager in Camberley, England
pros: Being so close to the wishes that are made, free creative licence, very open to new ideas and ways of working.
cons: Doesn't have the finances to reach the scales of exposure it should have, budgets are therefore rightfully tight. This does however reduce marketing impact and the strength of the charity within the UK sector

job_title: Senior Fundraising Manager in Reading, England
pros: Home working, good digital team, office is fun
cons: Cliques, toxic atmosphere, you need to be in the in crowd or you are invisible

review_title: Caring, forward thinking company who are making a real difference
pros:
- Plenty of opportunity to develop skills and grow
- Caring leadership team 
- Agile/flexible working
- Making a true difference
Great charity and a wonderful cause. The staff in the UK office are all lovely
